mdRecord.dcterms:title: Renoe, A. J. to Henry Faulds regarding IAI and materials; 02 of 02
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 41-117--Scrapbook 2Renoe, A. J. to Henry Faulds regarding an honorary IAI membership for Faulds, the publication of Renoe's own book on fingerprinting and asks for any information of interest, a request for a signed photograph of Faulds, and permissions for quotes to be used from Faulds's work. Letterhead of IAI lists Renoe as President and Secretary-Treasurer.; 2 pages; DF 870
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Faulds, Henry, 18431930
International Association for Identification
